::KitKat::

She smiled. "Thank you, we will be thre very shortly."
She motioned for Drillbit, Starscream, and GoldenEye to follow her.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Vehement:
> 
> 
> Vehement looked to Destructor, and the direction KitKat's comm. 
transmission 
> was coming from.
> Not very bright, he thought.  I'm with her own forces and she's 
asking me to 
> deactivate the autogun...unless this bot in front of me is lying...
> 
> Vehement activated his forearm computer's comm. unit.  "Your leader 
is here." 
> Vehement said to Destructor.
> 
> "KitKat, this is Vehement.  Defenses are on hold, it is safe to 
come to my 
> location and talk."
